dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6706 IH: Hunger Clearinghouse Enhancement Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Morelle (for himself and Ms. Meng) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to fund the information clearinghouse through fiscal year 2031, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Hunger Clearinghouse Enhancement Act of 2023.
Section 26 of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1769g(d)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by inserting , including information with respect to the utilization of trained volunteers, after provide information; and
by inserting resources that address ways to prevent hunger, after food assistance, ; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (d), by striking and $250,000 for each of fiscal years 2010 through 2024 and inserting and $750,000 for each of fiscal years 2024 through 2031.
